name: Container Image
description: The Docker Container image object. A Docker container image is a lightweight, standalone, executable package of software that includes everything needed to run an application: code, runtime, system tools, system libraries and settings.

uid.description: The container unique image ID. For example: 77af4d6b9913.
uid.name: Image ID

name.description: The container image name. For example: elixir.
name.name: Image Name
